text:
Clubhouse Software | New York, NY or REMOTE | http://clubhouse.io

We are looking for talented backend (Clojure, Datomic), frontend (JS), and mobile engineers to join us in building our project management tool created specifically for software product development teams. We are a small, friendly, and geographically-dispersed team with a focus on elevating the way organizations develop and distribute software.

If you are interested, learn more here - https://clubhouse.io/hiring
